about.title: Staking.Simplified.
about.text: Ankr provides decentralized staking services for Ethereum 2.0. Ankr's Eth2 staking protocol and platform combines staking and DeFi, implementing elements from traditional staking with non-custodial management, Micropools, instant liquidity and decentralized governance

calculate.title:
Calculate
your earnings
calculate.subtitle: This calculator is based on a estimation of 15 percent of annual staking rewards.

features.title: Why stake with Ankr?
features.text: Stake platform is built by the Ankr team, to provide the best user experience and highest level of safety, combined with an attractive reward mechanism and instant staking liquidity through a bond-like synthetic token called aETH.
features.micropool-text: Stake as little as 0.5 ETH and pool with other stakers while enjoy the same ROI
features.manager-text: Send all of your ETH in one transaction and the protocol will automatically allocate your funds to the best pools.
features.liquidity-text: With aETH, you can hold or trade your staked assets at any time, without having to wait until transactions are enabled on Ethereum 2.0.
features.security-text: Keep your funds under your own custody, to always remain in full control of your assets.

roles.title: The 3 rolesin Ankr's Eth2 staking ecosystem
roles.eth-staker-text: Stakers can stake any amount of ETH tokens (minimum 0.5 ETH) to earn staking rewards and platform fees. The staked ETH will immediately be liquid in the form of aETH, which users can use to trade or participate in DeFi. Stakers can stake ANKR in addition to their ETH stake to increase rewards from platform fees.
roles.node-provider-text: Node providers will be running Ethereum 2.0 nodes either on their own hardware or using the Ankr platform, to earn from the staking rewards and platform fees.
roles.governance-text: Governors will ensure the long term sustainability of the platform. A substantial stake of ANKR tokens is necessary to become part of the governance board (a governor does not necessary need to be a node provider).

become-provider.title:
Become
a provider
become-provider.text: Become a provider by running Ethereum 2.0 nodes on Ankr with no hardware or technical knowledge required.
become-provider.api-text: Integrate Ankr's Eth2 staking protocol with exchanges, wallets and custodian services
become-provider.knowledge-text: Run Ethereum 2.0 nodes on Ankr, no hardware or technical knowledge required.
become-provider.governance-text: Participate in governance and be a part of the future of the platform!

faq.title: FAQ
faq.answer-1: Stkr is a decentralized protocol and platform that combines staking and DeFi to remove entry barriers and democratize staking for everyone.
faq.question-2: Can I stake if I have less than 32 ETH?
faq.answer-2: Yes! To democratize access to Ethereum 2.0 for users who are unable to invest 32 ETH (the fixed amount required by the network), Stkr introduces Micropools – a proprietary solution that enables you to start staking with as little as 0.5 ETH. Simply choose the amount you want to delegate, and the system will automatically assign it to the best providers.
faq.answer-3: The Micropools mechanism is our unique solution for breaking down the economic barriers for Ethereum 2.0 staking. As the name implies, Micropools allow users to chip in smaller portions of ETH towards a Validator, and receive a proportionate reward based on their contribution.
faq.question-4: Will my funds become illiquid if I stake them before transactions are enabled on Ethereum 2.0?
faq.answer-4: No – Stkr effectively tackles the illiquidity issue of Ethereum 2.0 by introducing aETH and other synthetic assets that will enable you to sell your stake at any point in time.
faq.question-5: I have more than 32 ETH. Can I still stake with Stkr?
faq.answer-5: Despite that Ethereum 2.0 only enables you to stake multiples of 32 ETH, with Stkr you can stake all your tokens at once, without having to allocate them to multiple nodes. This means you can even stake 1,000 ETH in just one click!
faq.question-6: Can I run my own Ethereum 2.0 node on Stkr?
faq.answer-6: Yes! You can become a provider and run your own node to collect staking rewards. If you don’t have any hardware or technical knowledge to set up a node, you can always use Ankr and deploy your Ethereum 2.0 node in one click.
faq.question-7: What do I need to become a provider on Stkr?
faq.answer-7: To become a provider in Stkr and earn platform fees, you need to set up an Ethereum 2.0 node with a minimum “insurance” stake of 2 ETH to compensate users in case of slashing events.
faq.question-8: Can I use my ANKR tokens on Stkr?
faq.answer-8: The Stkr protocol introduces a new utility for ANKR, the native ERC-20 token of Ankr platform. Providers can stake ANKR token as an insurance fund and increase their reward rate. In addition to that, ETH stakers can stake ANKR tokens to increase their staking rewards from the platform fees!

features.1: Stake any amount of ETH (minimum 0.5 ETH) to earn staking rewards.
features.2: Keep your staked ETH liquid to trade, sell or participate in DeFi applications through aETH.

features.1: Run Ethereum 2.0 nodes and earn from staking rewards and platform fees.
features.2: Stake additional Ankr in your node to obtain a higher trust-level and have your micropools prioritized as well as earning more rewards!
features.3: Use the Ankr platform to host your nodes, to remove all technical and operational barriers, and avoid any slashing charges!

stake.title: Staking manager
stake.staking-period-tooltip: This is the number of months your tokens will be locked for in the staking contract.
stake.yearly-earning-tooltip: You should expect to earn this amount from your stake, per year. Note that this is an estimation only.

validation.balance-exceed: You entered a value that exceeds your balance

stake.agreement: I understand my staked funds will be locked for the duration of the Eth 2.0 staking period, and will not be redeemable until this ends.

staked-dashboard.locked: Any staked amounts will be locked for the duration of the ETH 2.0 contract. You will, however, receive aETH equivalent to your stake that you will be able to trade in the meantime, against your staked amount. Until aETH is made available, however, your funds will be locked and not redeemable.

tip.amount: Amount of ETH to be staked in this transaction
tip.txid: The Ethereum transaction ID. Click to view the transaction in the Eth explorer.

note.eth-node: If you don’t have it you can create a node using Infura or Ankr

placeholder.eth-node: Paste your Ethereum node link here

option.i-dont-have: I don’t have beacon chain node

hint.node-name: Please, enter any name for your node
hint.eth1Url: Please, enter the ETH 1.0 API endpoint from your running node or service here

not-enough-balance.title: To create your own node, you need to top-up your balance

top-up.title: Top-up your balance
top-up.ankr-min-deposit-notice: You need {value} ANKR on your wallet
top-up.eth-top-up-note:
Please note that if your insurance ever drops below 2 ETH due to slashing penalties, your node may stop running. To prevent this from happening, or to restart a node that has stopped because of this, please ensure your remaining insurance balance is at least 2 ETH. You can top this amount up here.

Also note that once deposited, any insurance amount remains locked in the Stkr system until the contract ends (Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1.5 release).

create-signature.text: We need you to sign login message to allow

rules-dialog.title: Rules of a Proposal
rules-dialog.subtitle: For any proposal, the following rules have been defined
rules-dialog.tip: You don’t have enough funds to create a project

item.1: Once the proposal is created, it will be available for voting.
item.2: The creator’s 5.000.000 ANKR will be locked for 2 weeks.
item.3: The creator will not be able to create another proposal with same locked tokens. However, he/she can still vote for other proposals.
item.4: An address can create at most 2 proposals in a month.
item.5: Once the voting period is ended, if the proposal has been accepted with a majority vote, then the proposal will be implemented by the Stkr team in the following 15 up to 30 days.

description.timing: Please set a time frame for the project. Select the number of days below

project-created-dialog.title: Project created!
project-created-dialog.subtitle: Your project got moderation, it will be launched after verification

item.1: To  participate  in  a  proposal,  users  must  give  allowance  to  Stkr’s  AnkrDepositContract.
item.2: Every deposited ANKR token has only one voting power (i.e., more tokens morevote power).
item.3: Users can deposit tokens before the voting period or while they vote.
item.4: Users can participate multiple proposals by voting with the same deposited tokens(as long as the address has sufficient ANKR tokens).
item.5: The voting power is equal to their deposit amount.

aeth-promo.title: What is aETH?
aeth-promo.text: aETH is a synthetic derivative asset that enables instant liquidity for the Ethereum 2.0 network

aeth-reward.title:
One asset.
Combined value.
aeth-reward.primary-text: aETH represents the staked ETH plus all future staking rewards.
aeth-reward.secondary-text: Initially, aETH is issued at a ratio of 1:1 to the amount of ETH staked. Over time, 1 aETH is expected to grow in ETH value, as it contains the principal stake plus staking rewards.

aeth-advantages.title: Instant liquidity
aeth-advantages.primary-text: aETH allows you to stake Eth2 and redeem rewards before the phase 1.5 goes live and the lockup period ends (which can take up to several years!).
aeth-advantages.secondary-text: aETH is listed on Uniswap for immediate liquidity. aETH holders can also provide liquidity to the aETH/ETH pair on the exchange platform and earn from transaction fees.

aeth-ecosystem.subtitle: Ecosystem
aeth-ecosystem.title: Access Ankr's Eth2 staking services and aETH here

services.uniswap: Decentralized liquidity pools and trading for aETH.
services.metamask: Store aETH and connect with DeFi applications.
services.onx: aETH staking pools and yield strategies for collateralized assets.
services.bitkeep: Direct access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.trustwallet: Mobile access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.imtoken: Mobile access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.standcash: aETH staking pool for algorithmic stablecoin protocol.
services.onto: Direct access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.snowswap: Incentivizing Eth2 adoption with aETH swaps and pools.

aeth-start.title: New yield opportunities with aETH
aeth-start.text: aETH is easily accessible and tradable on various DeFi platforms, with a growing number of yield earning opportunities. Start staking now and try it yourself!

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.text: Deposit ETH on Staking Manager (you can deposit any amount starting from 0.5 ETH) by connecting your wallet to the Ankr Staking platform.

get-aeth.title: Get aETH
get-aeth.text: Once your ETH is staked on the Beaconchain, your aETH balance will be added to the Ankr Staking platform for you to redeem.

use-aeth.title: Use aETH
use-aeth.text: You can store aETH in your wallet to keep full control of your funds. You can also trade aETH or use it in DeFi products to earn yield. Please note that if you are trading aETH, you are effectively trading your entire investment (both the invested amount and the expected reward).

redeem.title: Redeem your ETH + staking rewards
redeem.text: As soon as Ethereum 2.0 transactions are activated, you can use your aETH to redeem your staked ETH + staking rewards on the Ankr Staking platform.

aeth-banner.title: What is aETH?
aeth-banner.text: aETH is a synthetic derivative asset that enables instant liquidity for the Ethereum 2.0 network
